org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui

Class Popover

  • Object
    • AbstractTooltip
      • Popover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptsOneWidget, HasOneWidget, HasWidgets, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>, HasHover, HasId

    public class Popover
extends AbstractTooltip
    Basic implementation for the Bootstrap Popover

    Bootstrap Documentation

    UiBinder example

     
 <b:Popover text="...">
    ...
 </b:Popover>

    Author:
    Steven Jardine

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface HasWidgets

        HasWidgets.ForIsWidget

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Popover()
      Creates the empty Popover
      Popover(String title)
      Creates the popover with given title.
      Popover(String title, String content)
      Creates the popover with given title and content.
      Popover(Widget w)
      Creates the popover around this widget
      Popover(Widget w, String title, String content)
      Creates the popover around this widget with given title and content.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Popover

        public Popover()
        Creates the empty Popover

      • Popover

        public Popover(String title)
        Creates the popover with given title. Remember to set the content and widget as well.
        Parameters:
        title - title for the popover

      • Popover

        public Popover(String title,
               String content)
        Creates the popover with given title and content. Remember to set the widget as well.
        Parameters:
        title - title for the popover

      • Popover

        Creates the popover around this widget
        Parameters:
        w - widget for the popover

        public Popover(Widget w,
               String title,
               String content)
        Creates the popover around this widget with given title and content.
        Parameters:
        w - widget for the popover
        title - title for the popover
        content - content for the popover

      • updateTitleWhenShowing

        protected void updateTitleWhenShowing()
        Update the title. This should only be called when the title is already showing. It causes a small flicker but updates the title immediately.
        Specified by:
        updateTitleWhenShowing in class AbstractTooltip
